summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West 56th Street, from 32nd Avenue Northwest to 34th Avenue Northwest; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 14135 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
